codeSystems.name: ChElmExpectingOrganismSpecification
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Expecting Organism Specification
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the leading codes for the laboratory test results, which have to be completed by another code for the expecting organism.
codeSystems.ConceptMap-ch-elm-expecting-organism-spe: CH ELM Expecting Organism Specification To Results Completion Vs

codeSystems.name: ChElmExpectingSpecimenSpecification
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Expecting Specimen Specification
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the leading codes for the laboratory test results, which have to be completed by another code for the expecting specimen.
codeSystems.ConceptMap-ch-elm-expecting-specimen-spe: CH ELM Expecting Specimen Specification To Results Completion Vs

codeSystems.name: ChElmFophPatientNameRepresentation
codeSystems.title: CH ELM FOPH Patient Name Representation
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM resource defines the codes which identify possible patient name schemas to be used.
codeSystems.ConceptMap-ch-elm-results-to-foph-patien: CH ELM Results To FOPH Patient Name Representation

codeSystems.name: ChElmInterpretationCodesPos
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Interpretation Codes Positive
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the code for positive interpretation code.

codeSystems.name: ChElmInterpretationCodesPosNeg
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Interpretation Codes Positive and Negative
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the code for positive and negative interpretation codes.

codeSystems.name: ChElmInterpretationCodesResistantSusceptible
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Interpretation Codes Resistant and Susceptible
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the code for resistant and susceptible interpretation codes.

codeSystems.name: ChElmInterpretationCodeVs
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Interpretation Codes Vs
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the value set URLs as interpretation codes to map in the concept maps the leading codes.

codeSystems.name: ChElmLabStudyTypes
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Lab Study Types
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the codes for the laboratory specialties.

codeSystems.name: ChElmObservationInterpretationCodes
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Observation Interpretation Codes
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the codes for the qualitative interpretation of the observation values (susceptible/resistant).

codeSystems.name: ChElmResultsCodedValuesLaboratory
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Results Coded Values Laboratory
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the codes for the laboratory test results (presence/absence).

codeSystems.name: ChElmResultsCompletionVs
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Results Completion Vs
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the value set URLs as codes to map in the concept maps the leading codes, which must be completed with additional codes.

codeSystems.name: ChElmResultsCpeOrg
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Results Cpe Org
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the codes for the laboratory test results to complete the leading code with an additional code.

codeSystems.name: ChElmResultsGeniSpec
codeSystems.title: CH ELM Results Geni Spec
codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the codes for the laboratory test results to complete the leading code with an additional code.

codeSystems.description: This CH ELM value set includes the codes for the laboratory test results (organism).
